hero.title: FAQ
hero.subtitle: A question? We probably already have the answer.

questions.question: What is a KYA-SoP?
questions.answer: It is an intelligent and locally assembled solar power system by KYA, designed to efficiently meet the energy needs in rural and urban areas.

questions.question: What does the KYA-SolDesign software do?
questions.answer: KYA-SolDesign is a software for sizing and simulating solar photovoltaic systems.

questions.question: What are the advantages of a KYA solar system?
questions.answer: The advantages are numerous: energy autonomy, reduction of electricity bills, use of a clean and sustainable energy source, etc.

questions.question: Do solar panels need maintenance?
questions.answer: Yes, regular maintenance is recommended to ensure optimal performance. This includes cleaning the panels and checking the components.

questions.question: Are solar solutions accessible to everyone?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer financing solutions and support to make our solar systems accessible to as many people as possible.

questions.question: Do you take care of the installation?
questions.answer: Yes, our team of qualified technicians takes care of the complete installation of your solar system.

questions.question: Are there any aids or subsidies?
questions.answer: Depending on your country and your situation, there may be government aid or subsidies for the installation of solar systems.

questions.question: What is the lifespan of a solar system?
questions.answer: A well-maintained solar system can have a lifespan of over 25 years.

questions.question: What is the warranty on your products?
questions.answer: We offer a warranty on our products. The duration of the warranty varies depending on the components of the system.

questions.question: How can I contact you?
questions.answer: You can contact us via the contact form on our website, by email, or by phone.

questions.question: Do KYA solar systems work in the event of a power outage?
questions.answer: Yes, our systems can be equipped with batteries to store energy and provide you with electricity in the event of a power outage.

hero.title: Our Certifications
hero.subtitle: A testament to our commitment to quality and excellence.
hero.description: At KYA Energy Group, we are committed to providing reliable and high-performing energy solutions. Our certifications, issued by internationally recognized organizations, attest to the quality of our products and our adherence to the strictest standards.

details.subtitle: A guarantee of quality and trust
details.paragraph1: KYA Energy Group is proud to be ISO 9001:2015 certified. This internationally recognized certification attests to our commitment to a rigorous quality management system. It ensures that our products and services consistently meet our customers' requirements and comply with applicable regulations.
details.paragraph2_strong: This certification is the result of a collective effort and a shared vision: to place quality at the heart of all our activities.
details.paragraph3: For our customers, it is the assurance of benefiting from reliable, high-performing, and sustainable energy solutions, supported by excellent customer service. For our team, it is a source of motivation to continuously improve and innovate.

essentials.title: The Essentials of Our Quality Approach
essentials.subtitle: Our quality approach is based on four fundamental pillars that guide our daily actions.

items.customerSatisfaction: Customer satisfaction at the heart of our concerns
items.teamCohesion: Team cohesion and involvement of our employees
items.healthyEnvironment: A healthy and safe working environment

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Quality
commitment.subtitle: The management of KYA Energy Group is committed to:
commitment.paragraph: Maintaining and continuously improving our quality management system in accordance with the requirements of the ISO 9001:2015 standard. Providing the necessary resources to achieve our quality objectives. Promoting a culture of quality at all levels of the company.
commitment.thanksParagraph1: We thank our customers, partners, and employees for their contribution to obtaining this certification.
commitment.thanksParagraph2: Together, we continue to build a sustainable energy future.

list.name: VeraSol Certification
list.description: VeraSol is a quality assurance program for off-grid solar solutions. This certification confirms that our products meet international standards for quality, durability, and performance. It ensures our customers receive reliable and sustainable products.

list.name: IECEE CB Certification
list.description: The IECEE CB scheme is an international system for the mutual acceptance of test reports and certificates for electrical and electronic components, equipment, and products. This certification facilitates international trade by harmonizing standards.

list.name: ISO 9001:2015
list.description: ISO 9001:2015 is the international standard for quality management systems. This certification demonstrates our ability to consistently provide products and services that meet customer and regulatory requirements.
